subtitles:
44848 48128 People once believed
that when someone dies....

48204 52328 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

52405 55608 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

55685 60720 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

60806 63722 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

63808 68603 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
112402 116248 There's a piece of glass.

120641 124966 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

125043 128159 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

131602 135400 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

135486 137644 All right, guys,
let's do it.

137721 140800 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

142248 144962 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

145048 149728 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

152567 155761 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

155847 160441 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

160527 162723 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

162762 165524 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

165600 168084 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

168161 171479 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

171566 174443 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
174519 176361 All right, clear out.

177684 180168 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

182326 186364 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

186440 188560 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

188646 192406 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

202006 204720 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

204806 208680 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

208728 211884 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
211922 214166 She's my friend.
214243 218002 Her and Eric.
218041 220208 You lied to her about Eric.

221886 225444 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

225521 227765 She's gonna die,
isn't she?

236445 241921 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.
242045 245325 She's gonna be fine.

263442 267326 A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

267402 270164 I used to think that was true
about everything...
270241 274480 families, friends, feelings.

274528 278326 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

278364 282565 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

319248 322327 What are you,
like the night watchman?

342764 346005 You know, what this place
needs is a...
346082 348326 good natural catastrophe.

348403 352642 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

352680 355567 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
355644 357840 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
357926 360842 Hey, hey, let me do it.

360928 364803 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

364841 367200 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

367248 369128 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
369166 371487 Hey, all right.
371564 373846 Now we're talking.
373923 378440 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

378526 382200 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

382286 386045 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

386122 387848 - You buying?
- I'm buying.

387925 391445 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
391521 394600 They make you fart big time.

400680 403279 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

403366 405888 from all the crap
floating around in it.
407000 410606 I wish I could have seen that.
468446 472762 Fire it up! Yeah!

510279 514048 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

536087 539319 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T- bird, cop car, cop car.

546282 548766 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

554568 556400 - Damn it!
- What was that?

556486 559047 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
559123 562288 Mickey, call it in for me!

652361 655325 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

655401 659727 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
659803 661923 Place looks fine to me.
661961 664685 Let's redecorate.
667082 671082 "Abash, the devil stood...

671120 673719 and felt how awful
goodness is.

673805 678207 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.
690799 693446 No, no, no, me first.

739288 742079 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

745800 749243 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

749320 751161 Look at that.
Look at that.

752447 756724 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

760244 762162 You go over there
and talk to your pals...
762200 765202 You sick fuck.

765240 768808 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
771925 776125 Look at that!
778245 780201 Pussies drink last, man.

781400 783721 - Fuck you, Tin Tin.
- Hey.

785083 787480 Shit ain't
even loaded, man.
787567 789648 This one is.

789724 792525 Which of you Motor City
motherfuckers...

792602 796725 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

796802 800523 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

800600 803563 - Fire it up! - Fire
it up! - Fire it up!
803640 806325 Fire it up! Fire it up!
806402 809366 Here's your shooters.

809442 811322 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

845282 848648 - I love you.
- Say that again.
854086 857365 Restaurant.

861844 864884 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

871646 874120 - Come here!
- No, no, no!

968240 970686 Couple more rings.
That's 24k.

970762 974608 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
974685 976919 Leather purse. Leather.
977006 981321 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

981408 985762 A blood stain
that's on here?

985848 988361 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

988447 991161 Now, you,
take it or leave it.
991247 993885 Right there for ya.
993962 998162 Decisions, decisions.
999639 1002679 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1002766 1005643 ...child molesting,
saprophyte motherfucker.

1005681 1007964 Close the gate
when you go out!

1008040 1010601 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1013162 1016441 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1020968 1025245 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.

1126002 1129004 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1131488 1135564 Halloween ain't till manana.
1175843 1179123 Fuck, you murderer!

1179200 1181722 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1181799 1185722 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1185808 1189088 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1189126 1191601 - You're out of your fucking mind...
- Listen!

1191687 1196319 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1196405 1201162 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1201201 1203560 Her name was Shelly.

1203646 1206523 You cut her.
You raped her.

1206600 1212162 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1221005 1225723 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1225800 1230240 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1234767 1237203 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1237280 1239840 We never miss.

1250006 1252001 - Try again!
- Aaah!

1256882 1261524 Victims.
Aren't we all?

1285241 1289403 - Look at this mess! What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.

1296481 1299128 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1303684 1306848 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1307922 1309764 Give me some of that
over there!

1311922 1315480 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1315528 1320121 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1320160 1323843 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1323919 1327966 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1328005 1331927 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1360727 1364362 You're thinking
about the past.
1366568 1368965 Dad gave me this.
1369042 1373041 Fifth birthday.

1373128 1377606 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1390927 1393287 Is she asleep?
1399242 1401400 I think we broke her.
1405246 1407279 I love her eyes.

1426086 1429126 Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!
1446964 1452287 I told you to stay out of here.

1452325 1455845 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1455922 1459806 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1459844 1462088 I don't have any dolls.
1462165 1465406 Get some food, huh?

1465445 1468322 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1473808 1477327 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
1486927 1490044 Thirty, forty dollars.
1491722 1494082 Who the fuck is this now?

1494120 1498119 Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

1500843 1504526 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1511805 1515881 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1523246 1527447 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1527485 1531283 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."
1533163 1535368 What are you talking about?
1535445 1538044 You heard me rapping, right?

1538121 1542082 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1544403 1547241 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1548728 1550962 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1555048 1559968 Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

1560045 1562480 Shit on me.
Shit on me!
1570604 1572761 You're not paying attention.

1577720 1582803 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1584366 1587684 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1590283 1593803 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1598886 1600804 Who's this sack of shit?

1600880 1603719 That's Tin Tin, one of
T- bird's little helpers.

1603805 1606721 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1606807 1609483 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1609560 1613559 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1613645 1618162 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1618239 1620080 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1620167 1623763 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.

1624924 1627244 What the hell
do you call that?
1628242 1630726 I call it blood, detective.

1630802 1634447 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1634485 1637161 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1643606 1646406 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1646483 1649005 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1649043 1651844 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1651921 1656121 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1656207 1661482 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1664925 1667399 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1683607 1687645 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1710566 1713366 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1713443 1716406 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1716483 1719207 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1719284 1721806 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1721883 1724165 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1724242 1729123 T- birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1729200 1732087 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1732163 1735760 - A whole jolly club...
- Please!

1735846 1738483 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1738560 1741121 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1742722 1745964 Each one of these is a life...
1746041 1748448 a life you helped destroy.

1748525 1751047 I'm begging you.
Don't kill me.
1751085 1754643 I'm not gonna kill you.

1754720 1758719 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1767005 1771043 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1772846 1776768 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1776845 1780326 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!
1780403 1782446 Is that gasoline I smell?

1803765 1807084 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.
1807160 1809366 One root beer.
1811284 1813922 I can't do anything.

1814008 1818285 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1824807 1829525 Police! Don't move!
I said, "Don't move!"

1829564 1832479 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1832565 1836325 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1836401 1841360 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1841408 1844601 Not one more step.
I'm serious.

1844640 1848840 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1848927 1851928 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1853722 1856762 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1856848 1860684 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1860761 1863322 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1863360 1867800 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1867848 1872481 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1872567 1876844 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1876921 1879242 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1879328 1883721 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1883807 1886281 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1886367 1889724 - Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1889801 1894922 - He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1895008 1898528 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1898605 1900926 Get away from there!

1901002 1904004 Cops!
Get outta here!
1912482 1916644 Oh, great, great.

1916721 1919205 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1919282 1921487 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1921564 1927165 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

1927242 1931001 Little early
for Devil's Night.
1932526 1935125 You are very restless.

1935202 1938280 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1938367 1942443 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

1953443 1956368 There are energies
aligning against you.

1956445 1958804 Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

1977160 1980967 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1981044 1984122 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

1984199 1985887 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

1985964 1988524 You must be
awfully disappointed.

1988601 1991804 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1991843 1994048 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1994125 1998527 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1998566 2001040 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2001126 2004166 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2006727 2009201 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2009288 2011963 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2012002 2014725 That's very reassuring.

2014764 2018648 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2018725 2023002 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2023088 2024843 Call it my need to know.
2057086 2059560 Let go, you creep!

2064528 2067684 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!
2069045 2071328 He couldn't have stopped.

2071405 2075519 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2075605 2078521 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2082482 2087047 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2088159 2091525 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2107762 2112164 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2112241 2116403 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2116480 2119759 Annie... look at that.

2119846 2123883 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments... "
2123960 2125926 What is this, a petition?

2126003 2128765 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2128842 2132764 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction in that neighborhood?

2132841 2138480 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2138566 2141961 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2142048 2145884 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2152607 2156203 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2158361 2162926 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2162964 2165362 Ah, I owe you one!

2193922 2197643 Tomorrow night
we can get high...

2197720 2201239 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2225120 2227642 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **
2233559 2236081 Come here, bird.

2236168 2238163 Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.
2238239 2240483 Bird. B-B-Birdie.
2240522 2243044 Here, birdie, birdie.

2243082 2245960 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.
2248482 2251560 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2256365 2258245 What the fuck?

2264363 2268727 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2270923 2273685 Don't sweat it.

2275325 2278241 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2285846 2290488 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2292406 2297124 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2297201 2300567 You need professional help.
2304845 2307367 He shoots! He scores!

2317082 2320640 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2320726 2323325 Stop me if you heard this one.

2323402 2326202 Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

2331400 2334047 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2334124 2337519 Don't you ever fucking die?
2337605 2339763 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2345048 2349440 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it... Fuck, does it hurt?

2351559 2355482 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2378719 2380647 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2383563 2386162 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2403204 2406925 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2418165 2422480 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2422567 2427122 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2437125 2441728 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2470279 2473808 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2473885 2476043 Now fill it up!
2477088 2480320 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2480406 2482967 I really need this.

2491205 2495003 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2495041 2497525 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2497602 2499961 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2500048 2502848 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2502925 2505600 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.
2509043 2511844 Hey, good night, Darla.
2514165 2517723 You stay put right there.
2525443 2528761 Get away, steamhead.

2558645 2564159 As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2564207 2566845 - the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2566921 2569760 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2569846 2572685 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2572724 2574805 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2574881 2576924 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2577001 2581566 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police...
2584520 2587886 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2591722 2593803 Good likeness.

2593880 2597448 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2597524 2599682 You still have your hat on.
2603442 2605446 I gotta sit down.
2614883 2619007 are you some kind of... ghost?

2628242 2632606 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2634524 2638447 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2638523 2641487 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2641564 2645965 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2646042 2648564 Come on. Read the file.

2648641 2652803 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2652880 2655968 Her body finally just gave it up.

2656007 2659728 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2669203 2671044 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2683243 2686408 I saw her
through your eyes.

2686485 2688480 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2688566 2693802 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2693879 2698444 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2698483 2701321 Give me something
I could work with.

2705963 2708361 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2708447 2711641 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2711727 2715045 would talk after
what happened to you?

2715122 2718200 I kept asking
questions and...

2718287 2720847 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2724683 2726563 This your wife?

2726640 2730927 Yeah, we, uh... Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2735607 2739443 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2739520 2742886 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2742963 2745840 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2755085 2759362 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2763841 2766920 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2770401 2773000 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2775925 2781526 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2792162 2795528 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2795605 2798606 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2798683 2801608 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2801685 2804802 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2804840 2807286 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2807362 2811601 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2811688 2816483 He winked at ya?
Musicians.

2816560 2818928 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2819005 2821403 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2821479 2826764 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.
2826840 2829487 You ain't lost everything.

2829564 2834446 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2834522 2837965 Fair enough. Catch.

2841447 2843767 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2843844 2845762 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2845801 2849320 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2849407 2853204 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2853281 2857242 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2859927 2864886 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2864962 2868079 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister?

2868124 2871318 My father's daughter.
That's right.

2871164 2874205 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2874281 2876439 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2876525 2879882 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

2880007 2883325 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

2883402 2886643 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.
2886720 2888887 Whatever the fuck that means.

2888926 2892561 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

2893606 2895601 Want to relax
that thing now?

2895639 2900127 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

2900204 2904405 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
2904443 2907042 I ain't making all this up.

2907119 2911444 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

2919682 2924487 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

2934327 2937204 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

2946123 2948319 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

2950966 2955646 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

2955723 2959482 I'll have the janitor
come on up.
3020775 3023048 You lost or hungry?

3043015 3045614 I don't know how many times I
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
